snippet.title: afflicted Official Trailer
snippet.description:
‘afflicted’ is set in a post-apocalyptic, dystopian future where THE_VIRUS and mass brainwashing have forced the planet into a catatonic, bunker ridden state. Through a repetitive and deceptive mantra; “Stay indoors. Listen to your local officials. We are all in this together.,” governments across the world have soothed the soft souls of the general public. But the few who have risen above the mass hypnosis will find the truth… and a lot of ammo. Don’t die, k?

Web: https://www.playafflicted.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/playafflicted
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playafflicted
Instagram: http://instagram.com/playafflicted
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2193730/afflicted/
